Sub Start() Dim sSQL1 as String,sSQL2 as String Dim oRecord1 as Object GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN")
if oDoc.isReadOnly then Dim oController as Object
oController = oDoc.CurrentController oController.setFormDesignMode(False)
SetDocUserProperty("oUserID_lokal", iUserID("Korrespondenz")) SetDocUserProperty("oEinstellungsID_lokal", iEinstellungsID(iUserID_lokal)) sSQL1="select Startoption,Unloaded,Export from Start where StartID="& iUserID_lokal oRecord1=oResult(sSQL1) While oRecord1.next() SetDocUserProperty("oStartoption", oRecord1.getInt(1)) SetDocUserProperty("oUnloaded", oRecord1.getInt(2)) SetDocUserProperty("oExport", oRecord1.getInt(3)) Wend
SetDocUserProperty("oTitle_lokal",sTitle(iUserID_lokal))
Betriebsart_aendern(iStartoption) sSQL2="update Start set Startoption=0,Unloaded=1,Startlock=0,Export=0 where StartID="& iUserID_lokal SQL_execute(sSQL2)
StatusBar(False) ToolBar(False) End if FormSize() End Sub
